_sText:
I added a door in the Jail that opens and closes the instant the cell doors open to one side and instantly.
There is a cell with the glass floor down to the cell below and one that has a wall that can be transferred.
Inside the Jail is a hidden button that opens the door of the jail, and on top of insulation is a invisible ladder that lets you go upstairs where there are guns, a button that opens and closes the cells and another that opens the door armeria .
	
And where once the pool is an aviation doorman and a ball, and a glass floor that if I destroyed it fall into the pool where I was.
There is a site within armeria teleports.
